docs.snippet: Gola, still the Division I record-holder in career rebounds, led La Salle to the National Invitation Tournament title in 1952 and the N.C.A.A. title in 1954 before helping the Philadelphia Warriors to the N.B.A. title in 1956....
docs.lead_paragraph: Gola, still the Division I record-holder in career rebounds, led La Salle to the National Invitation Tournament title in 1952 and the N.C.A.A. title in 1954 before helping the Philadelphia Warriors to the N.B.A. title in 1956.
docs.abstract: Tom Gola, virtual folk hero in Philadelphia for his basketball exploits in high school, college and the pros in the 1950s, dies at age 81.

headline.main: Tom Gola, a Philadelphia Basketball Legend, Dies at 81
